original_text: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes, the chief ruler of the synagogue, and beat him before the judgment seat. And Gallio cared for none of those things.
korean_text: 모든 사람이 회당장 소스데네를 잡아 법정 앞에서 때리되 갈리오가 이 일을 상관하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes
the chief ruler of the synagogue
and beat him before the judgment seat
And Gallio cared for none of those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 갈리오는 그런 일들 중 어떤 것도 관심 없었다
